::DarkMouse::

She looked around the lab.  She saw at one end of the room, saw 
something sparkling.  She walked closer and saw what looked like a 
spark gettig cut with a lazar.  She wondered what or who's it might 
have been.  She turned and walked over to the console.  She looked at 
te monitor and saw the read outs on the spark.  She noticed that it 
was Megatron's patters showing up on the screen. She swallowed hard. 
Then speaks in a very hushed voice,"Megatron, if it is his spark, 
then he must be dead. Inferno was right. They killed Megatron."  she 
got an evil grin on her face. "About time."  She went over to the 
stack of papers. She picked them up and started reading them.
